arts.ttl: Martin O’Neill says Celtic endured ‘tough evening’ in Midtjylland defeat
arts.sum: The host scored three quickfire goals in the first half.

arts.ttl: Europa League: Midtjylland dispatch Celtic as Nottingham Forest draw blank
arts.sum: Martin O’Neill’s side leak three first-half goals in 3-1 defeat Gibbs-White misses penalty as Forest held by Sturm Graz Celtic’s revival under Martin O’Neill came juddering to a halt in Jutland after they were beaten 3-1 by Midtjylland. The Hoops’ hopes of prolonging their Europa League campaign into the knockout stages suffered a major blow as the Danes hammered in three goals in eight first-half minutes. The teenage substitute Callum Osmand won a late penalty which Reo Hatate converted, but the 19-year-old was then taken off on a stretcher in tears after suffering what appeared to be a hamstring injury on a horrible evening for the Scottish champions. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton makes next Celtic manager claim after Midtjylland defeat

arts.ttl: O'Neill given reality check as Celtic beaten by Midtjylland after goal blitz
arts.sum: Celtic were beaten 3-1 at Europa League table-toppers Midtjylland to make it a miserable return to European football for Hoops interim boss Martin O’Neill as he suffered his first defeat in charge.

arts.ttl: FC MIDTJYLLAND 3 CELTIC 1: A DARK NIGHT IN DENMARK
arts.sum: FC MIDTJYLLAND 3 CELTIC 1 MARTIN O’NEIIL’S brief honeymoon period as the returning Celtic manager came crashing to a thumping conclusion in Midtjylland tonight. The interim boss stared in disbelief as Celtic collapsed to a shocking defeat after gifting the Danes three goals in a horrendous eight-minute period in the first-half. They never recovered on [...]

arts.ttl: FC Midtjylland v Celtic – This is the day, that we must win away
arts.sum: If Celtic wants to advance in the Europa League then we need to beat FC Midtjylland this evening.This is a winnable match that we really must win… That’s the target that Martin O’Neill will be setting in the away dressing room at the MCH Arena in Herning.
